Name: Sumit
AboutMe:
A Microsoft Technology professional with 6 years of experience. I am defined as a technology savvy person. You throw a new challenge at me and I am more than happy to accept that challenge. Till now I have been lucky to work on different Microsoft technologies and I hope this pattern continues.

I am now eyeing towards open source technologies and Big Data is one of my favorites. I recently got a chance to work on Casandra for a small project and I totally felled in love with it. So, now I have started exploring more about big data.

I also love to travel and always look for places where I can go for a quick trip.
